Collection of sequences for known structures or decoys¶

SOAP Sequence module, a module for process protein sequences in pir format.

class sequences.pir(path='')[source]¶

Process pir files for use by MDT.

MDT calcualte statistics from structures by looping throgh a pir file contains all pir sequences for the structures.

The last two field in the pir header( X-ray resolution and the r factor) can be overwiritten to define the error bar parameters associated with each structure, used by MDT to cacluate the error bar on the position of each atom.

Parameters :
  • path: path to the pir file.
